issue.message: Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "value", in com.azure.xml.XmlWriter.writeXml) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions
issue.errorLine1: public XmlWriter writeXml(XmlSerializable<?> value, String rootElementName) throws XMLStreamException {
